title: Phaser Lock Interactive Announced Final Approach to be a Launch Title for the Oculus Touch
text:
Phaser Lock Interactive announced that their first VR game title, Final Approach, will be a launch title for the Oculus Touch. The game will feature additional content specific to the Oculus and make use of the unique gesture recognition technology of the Oculus Touch controllers.
Austin, TX (PRWEB) September 26, 2015
Phaser Lock Interactive announced that their first VR game title, Final Approach, will be a launch title for the Oculus Touch. The game will feature additional content specific to the Oculus and make use of the unique gesture recognition technology of the Oculus Touch controllers.
Phaser Lock CTO John Nagle said, "We feel the Touch controllers set a new high water mark in controller design and functionality that will give players an even stronger sense of immersion in virtual environments." Chief Creative Officer Michael Daubert added, "We're proud of our partnership with the Oculus team and honored to be a part of gaming history. We're excited at the creative opportunities ahead of us."
Final Approach is an aviation-themed game that allows players to manage the skies around an airport, taking control of planes, helicopters and even UFOs. The player's missions will include firefighting, search and rescue operations, shooting down armed drones and so much more. Final Approach is played from 2 vantage points, a "god mode" in which the player controls the entire world and its inhabitants from an aerial perspective, and a "toy mode" where the player becomes toy-sized and can interact with the life-sized environment.
About Phaser Lock Interactive:
Phaser Lock Interactive LLC is an Austin-based VR-focused game company composed of industry veterans whose gaming pedigree stretches back to the days of the Playstation I and Super Nintendo systems.
About Oculus:
Oculus is focused on enabling players to experience anything, anywhere through virtual reality. The Oculus Rift and the Oculus-powered Samsung Gear VR allow players to step inside virtual worlds and immerse themselves like never before. As a result of the global Oculus developer community, VR is poised to transform gaming, storytelling, film, and much more.
